## TRUTH × EXPERIENCE Philosophy

**This sprint must advance BOTH dimensions. All tickets inherit this mandate.**

### Sprint TRUTH Objectives
<!--
What correctness, verification, or technical foundation is this sprint building?
Examples:
- New test coverage
- Bug fixes
- Data integrity improvements
- Performance optimizations
-->

### Sprint EXPERIENCE Objectives
<!--
What confidence, clarity, or emotional credibility is this sprint delivering?
Examples:
- Reduced confusion in UX
- Better error messages
- Intuitive workflows
- Trust-building features
-->
